Karen Denman
============

[Mayor and City Council directory](https://www.huntsvilletx.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=23)
[Mayor & City Council Page](http://www.huntsvilletx.gov/343/Mayor-City-Council)

![](https://www.huntsvilletx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=23736)

**Karen Denman**

**Councilmember At-Large Position 2**

**Email:
[kdenman@huntsvilletx.gov](mailto:kdenman@huntsvilletx.gov)
Phone:936-291-5413**

Karen Denman is a lifelong resident of Huntsville.   She has served on many local boards and currently serves on the SAAFE House Board as well as Treasurer for the Walker County Area  Go Texan Committee.   She has worked in the financial services industry for over 30 years and currently serves as Senior Loan Officer for Walker County Federal Credit Union as well as holding a real estate license as an agent for HITTSS Solutions, LLC.

Karen has a servant’s heart and is dedicated and committed to serving the citizens of Huntsville alongside the current council to continue to position Huntsville for the future.

In her spare time, Karen loves to volunteer for all events serving a good cause, she loves to travel to tropical destinations, and a good book is always within reach.  She has one daughter, Jordyn Denman.
